title: The Story of Easter: An Easter And Springtime Book For Kids (Trophy Picture Books
description: With an informative text and glorious illustrations, this book explains both how and why people all over the world celebrate Easter. It tells the biblical story of Jesusâ€™ Resurrection and then describes how people honor this day and the origins of these traditions. Hands-on activities help draw children into the spirit of this joyous celebration of rebirth.
author: Aileen Fisher
